mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM devops_env_command d WHERE d.object = #{objectType} and d.object_id = #{objectId} ORDER BY d.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT d.* FROM devops_env_command d WHERE d.object = #{objectType} and d.object_id = #{objectId}
AND d.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND d.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY d.id DESC
SELECT d.* FROM devops_env_command d WHERE d.object = #{objectType} AND d.object_id = #{objectId} AND d.command_type IN ('update','create','delete') ORDER BY d.id DESC limit 30

SELECT dc.id, dc.STATUS, de.id envId, de.project_id projectId, dc.creation_date FROM devops_env_command dc LEFT JOIN devops_app_service_instance dai ON dc.object_id = dai.id LEFT JOIN devops_env de ON de.id = dai.env_id LEFT JOIN devops_deploy_record ddr ON dc.id = ddr.deploy_id AND ddr.deploy_type = 'manual' WHERE dc.object = 'instance' AND command_type IN ( 'update', 'create' ) AND ddr.id IS NULL AND de.project_id IS NOT NULL
